title: Morgan Stewart's ex-husband Brendan Fitzpatrick is 'dating' Amanda Stanton just weeks after split
text:
He split from wife of three years, Morgan Stewart, back in August.

And two months on, Brendan Fitzpatrick, 31, is dating Bachelor in Paradise star, Amanda Stanton, 29, according to TMZ.

The couple began dating approximately 'over a month ago' after meeting via mutual friends.

Scroll down for video

New couple? It was reported on Tuesday that Bachelor In Paradise alum, Amanda Stanton, is dating newly single Brendan Fitzpatrick - following his split from wife, Morgan Stewart

The couple were reportedly spotted holding hands at Nobu Newport Beach.

MailOnline have reached out to both Amanda and Brendan's representatives.

His appearance comes after he split from the Rich Kids of Beverly Hills star back in August after three years of marriage and six years together.

Morgan confirmed the news on Instagram Stories with the timing just five months after Page Six reported she had 'engaged in an inappropriate relationship' with her former boss at E!, Bryce Kristensen. The pair both denied the allegations.

Over: His appearance comes after he split from the Rich Kids of Beverly Hills star back in August after three years of marriage and six years together

Single and ready to mingle! Amanda has been single since April 2019

Morgan penned: 'Brendan and I have spent six wonderful years together, but we have made the difficult decision to go our separate ways.'

She added that their reason for separation was 'nothing to do with anything other than two people who sadly grew apart, deciding what's best for themselves in the next phase of their lives.'

'Thank you from the bottom of my heart for the extremely heartfelt and supportive messages so many of you have sent — they have meant the world to me. I will always have a tremendous amount of love and respect for Brendan and our relationship.'

Out of the blue! As for Amanda, she revealed back in April that she was 'blindsided' by her split from now ex-boyfriend, Bobby Jacobs

As for Amanda, she revealed back in April that she was 'blindsided' by her split from now ex-boyfriend, Bobby Jacobs.

The pair got a house together just weeks before they ended things and she felt as though they would be engaged by the end of the year.

'It's super fresh and aside from that, I was completely blindsided and it just happened very suddenly,' she said at the time on Instagram Stories.

'You guys know we just got a place together.'

'We had talked about things like getting engaged … I thought we were going to get engaged by the end of the year. When we got a place together, to me, that was as serious as an engagement and he knew that. So I was very surprised.'

Amanda currently lives in Laguna Beach with her two daughters, Kinsley, seven, and Charlie Emma, five.
description: it was reported on Tuesday that Bachelor In Paradise alum, Amanda Stanton, is dating newly single Brendan Fitzpatrick - following his split from wife, Morgan Stewart.
